name: PizzaMan
description:
this is a remake of pacman but with Pizza!

WASD to move around the maze

eat the pizza slices to gain points

eat a full pizza to eat the ghosts
sometimes a bonus item will pop up(BreadStick, Soda, Spaghatti, Wine)
and eating them will give you bonus

not the perfect pacman recreation, but enjoy! and please post your high score in the comments
